Articles.Content:
Alright, this thread is here so you can post the amount of time you spent on certain games.

This is from my steam list: (I only picked 10 out of 21)

Euro Truck Sim 2: 72 hours

Arma 2: 401 hours

Arma 2 Operation Arrowhead: 410 hours

Just Cause 2: 144 hours

Just Cause 2 MP mod: 11 hours

KSP: 609 Hours

Take on Helicopters: 17 hours

TF2: 43 hours

Wargame: Airland Battle: 133 hours

Wargame: European Escalation: 135 hours

So, what about you?

Star Trek Online: At least 1000, steam says 562, but steam bugged out on me last year and I had to play it w/o the middle man.

Just Cause 2: 28 hours.

JC2-MP: 30 hours.

Ace of Spades: 42 hours.

ArmA 2: 40 hours.

War Thunder: 11 hours.

FTL: 3 hours.

Space Engineers: 5 hours.

Garry's Mod: 5 hours.

Star Conflict: 2 hours.

KSP: At least 100 hours.

Most of these games I've only had since summer/winter sales this year, so numbers are growing.

Garry's mod: 116 hours

KSP Demo: 35 minutes

Portal 2: 12 hours

CS:GO: 4 hours

CS:S: 5 hours

I don't have KSP on Steam, so...

From Steam:

KSP: 166 hours

Wargame: Airland Battle: 34 hours

Arma 3: 40 hours

Borderlands 2:25 hours

CSGO: 21 hours

Civ V 35 hours

From Origin:

Battlefield 3: 280+ hours

Battlefield 4: 70+ hours

(i actually have around another 300 - 400 hours on KSP outside of steam)

Team Fortress 2: 381 hours

Garry's Mod: 245 hours

Kerbal Space Program: 54 hours

Terraria: 143 hours

HL2 + episodes: 87 hours

CS:GO: 13 hours

Battlefield 3: 230+ hours

Team Fortress 2: 178 hours

Kerbal Space Program: 143 hours

Blacklight Retribution: 108 hours

Garry's Mod: 107 hours

Mount and Blade: Warband: 106 hours

Call of Duty 4: 104 hours

Battlefield 4: 93 hours

Terraria: 82 hours

Modern Warfare 3: 100+ (go drop zone!)

Payday 2: 74 hours

Max Payne 3: 72 hours

GTA 4: 71 hours

XCOM(Enemy Unknown and Within): 61 hours

Portal 2: 55 hours

Star Wars KOTOR: 49 hours

I do a lot more, I only started on steam in mid-2013.

..and play MC.

So,

Minecraft: 1000 hours.

Audiosurf: 4 hours

Burnout paradise: Ultimate box: 7 hours

C&C RA3: 9 hours

Door kickers: 3 hours

Euro Truck simulator 2: 58 hours

Just cause 2: 2 hours

Just cause 2-MP: 11 hours

Kerbal space program: 168 hours (I only re-bought it on steam at 0.21, but I've played at LEAST 1000 hours.

Mirrors Edge: 5 hours

Sid meirs ace patrol: Pacific skies: 103 minutse

Civ IV: Beyond the sword: 5 hours (I just got it 3 days ago!)

Civ V: 93 hours

Sid Meier PIRATES!: 110 minutes

Sid Meier Railroads!: 2 hours

Space Engineers: 8 hours

Take on Mars: 92 minutes

Trackmania 2: Canyon: 8 hours

Trackmania 2: Stadium: 4 hours

Trackmania 2: Valley: 2 hours

Sanctum 2: 2 hours

Yes I have a lot of games!

As I don't play KSP through Steam I dunno how many hours I've played but I've played about 13 hours so far today alone due to a weird bug with my relative velocity indicator (I can be right next to the other ship and it says there is nearly 2k difference in speed). Don't you just hate bugs due to mods... I've been ripping out mods and checking, putting them back and then ripping out others to see if it makes any difference... and the hours just fly by.

So, for my longest play times:

446 Hours in Kerbal Space Program. This doesn't count probably about 200 hours I put in when I got it around .14

211 Hours in Dungeons and Dragons Online. I've certainly played a boatload more since it didn't come on steam for about three years after I started playing.

175 Hours in XCOM: Enemy Unknown

128 Hours in Skyrim.

Not bothering to count anything else... that's a lot of hours already.
